Summary: nightly observation of starlike object in west coast north california at dusk
Object Shape: Boomerang, Fireball, Flash, Sphere, Star-like, Other
divs: Sighting Detailsobject appears just after sundown about 20 degrees up from the horizen...in the same spot night after night ...it remains about 20 min the desends at a slow rate-much like the night sky would only at a quicker pace.It is the first thing to appear in the night sky and becomes ,by far the brightest ,it burns like a small ball of fire and changes colors from bright white to red to green to yellow to white.After watching it for many nights in a row i chose to get a camera out ...And that is when it goy amazing...i captured photos of this object morphing from a ball of light to a ship like object which separated in 2 and released a red z shaped lighting bolt like thing from it and that thing descended to the ground all the while appearing to be a ball of light to the naked eye but the camera cought it all...i have the photos.
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Santa Rosa
There were no other sightings in Santa Rosa on or around June 17th 2013
